name: Battle Chess II: Chinese Chess
description: Battle Chess II brings new life into Chinese Chess. A game of strategy with animated battles to bring the game to life. It is an entertainment that will prove the words of the famous Oriental Philosopher/Chef Kung Pao who said "War is fun!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10) Processor: 1 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 10.8 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
recommended_requirements: Processor: 1.4 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 20 MB available space
